Ansible Docker - Docker API Error

If you try to run a playbook with the ansible-docker plugin, and you get an error like this

1 failed: [192.168.2.xxx] => {"changed": false, "failed": true}
2 msg: Docker API Error: client and server don't have same version (client : 1.19, server: 1.18)
3 
4 FATAL: all hosts have already failed -- aborting

Solution

You can set the api version to a fixed version. The better way is to use the “auto” feature from docker-py:

1 - name: start ....
2     docker:
3       docker_api_version: auto
4       image: ....
25/09/2015 0 Comments docker ansible
